effect.gold_silver: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120. Target’s weight | Power --------------- | ----: Up to 10kg | 20 Up to 25kg | 40 Up to 50kg | 60 Up to 100kg | 80 Up to 200kg | 100 Above 200kg | 120
effect.crystal: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120. Target’s weight | Power --------------- | ----: Up to 10kg | 20 Up to 25kg | 40 Up to 50kg | 60 Up to 100kg | 80 Up to 200kg | 100 Above 200kg | 120

short_effect.gold_silver: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.
short_effect.crystal: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.

flavor_text.gold_silver: An attack that may cause flinching.
flavor_text.crystal: An attack that may cause flinching.
